pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Moisture Rich Night Cream 75g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Moisture Rich Night Cream helps skin to maintain its natural moisture balance while you sleep.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes. SUNBURN ALERT: This product contains retinol. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using this product.

Common Uses

Containing Natural Cocoa Butter, Retinol and Antioxidant Vitamin E, this unique formula promotes softer, smoother skin overnight. Dermatologist Tested. Safe for Sensitive Skin.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Cyclopentasiloxane, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Cyclohexasiloxane, Diethylhexyl Sebacate, Glycereth-26, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Retinol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Tocopherol Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Hydrolyzed Milk Protein, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Phenoxyethanol, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Ceteareth-20, Sodium Polyacrylate, Fragrance (Parfum), Ethylhexylglycerin, Tetrasodium EDTA, Propylene Glycol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Steareth-20, N-Hydroxysuccinimide, BHT, Chrysin, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin.

Directions

After cleansing, apply to the entire face and neck area each evening. Nightly use leaves skin looking more radiant, youthful and healthy.
